title: WTB: N172 and N300 Louisville Players

posts.post_title: WTB: N172 and N300 Louisville Players
posts.post_content:
Hello - I am looking to purchase or trade for any Louisville players from N172 Old Judge and N300 Mayo. I would also especially love a Louisville Old Judge cabinet. Please let me know if you have any available. 

Thanks,
Chris :)
